detail_desc: Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué on the front.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a gentle V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a smocked back. Seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Plastic yoyo with a lenticular print. Diameter 4.5 cm.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace details, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Sun hat in a patterned cotton weave with elastication and a sewn-on bow at the back and ties under the chin. Lined.
Long-sleeved tops in ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide top in soft, ribbed jersey with short sleeves with overlocked edges and an overlocked hem.
Fitted shirt in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Crinkled blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with a smocked stand-up collar and long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed mesh key pocket in the waistband.
Two-strand necklace of thin metal chains with pendants. Adjustable length, 43-51 cm.
Warm-lined boots in shiny imitation leather with a zip in one side, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 2 cm.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with mesh details, a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage with gathered detailing at the back.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Lightweight nylon jacket with a ribbed stand-up collar layered with a woven collar and press-stud over the top. Zip down the front, adjustable fastening at the cuffs, zipped front pockets and an inner pocket with a press-stud. Lined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with an interactive motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.

Push-up bra in lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Short, tiered skirt in an airy, patterned cotton weave. Regular waist with wide smocking. Lined.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake jetted back pocket with a button.
5-pocket jeans in supersoft stretch denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and slim legs.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a square neckline, lined front and wide elastic hem. Medium support.
Tiered skirts in organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist. One with an all-over print.
Underwired bra in lace with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. One pair of hoops and three pairs with pendants. Length from 1.7 cm to 5 cm.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in soft, garter-stitched organic cotton. Jumper with buttons at the shoulders, long raglan sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and roll-edge hems.
Jumper in a marled knit containing some wool with ribbed side sections, slits in the sides and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and side pockets. Unlined.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with an integral sports bra and low-cut back. Lined sports bra with an elasticated hem and an opening at the back with crossover straps.
Soft slippers with embroidery and appliqués. High shaft with a hook and loop fastening at the back. Faux shearling linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Sleeveless dress in a crinkled, patterned weave with a V-neck front and back. Sewn-in wrapover and concealed press-stud at the front, double flounce around the neckline, ties across the back of the neck and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.

Lightly padded parka in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, faux fur-lined hood with a foldover edge, patch on one sleeve and a zip and quilted wind flap with press-studs down the front. Drawstring at the waist, flap side pockets with a press-stud and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Partly lined in faux fur.
Long-sleeved tops in printed cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a button placket and chest pocket .
Brazilian briefs in soft jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back. The cotton content of the briefs is organic.

Short, fitted blouse in an organic cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Square neckline front and back, a concealed zip in one side and short, wide puff sleeves with pleats at the hems. Lined in a cotton weave.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in ribbed cotton jersey with elastication at the top and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft, patterned cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Calf-length skirt knitted in band yarn with a slight sheen. High waist with a wide, elasticated waistband, a wide, ribbed hem, and a slit in one side. Short jersey underskirt.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a ribbed polo neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Single-breasted jacket in a linen weave with peak lapels, a chest pocket, jetted front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Semi-opaque tights that shape the tummy, thighs and calves while also encouraging blood circulation in the legs. Elasticated waist. 70 denier.

Fully lined bikini. Top with glittery, elastic shoulder straps, a small metal decoration at one side, glittery elastication at the top and several tiers of flounces. Bottoms with glittery elastic and a flounce at the top.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps and short sleeves. Flounce at the top and smocking at the hem.
Jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Jersey lining.
Underwired bra in lace with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Comfort blanket in soft velour with an animal-shaped head and paws. Polyester filling. Length approx. 25 cm.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Fitted dress in a soft knit with a round neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.

Concentrated, scented machine and hand wash laundry liquid. Black is always in style! This liquid will retain the colour of your clothes while treating stains and cleaning them, even at low temperatures. For all types of laundry (30-90°C). Select 30°C to save energy (your laundry will be just as clean). Free from phosphates, zeolites and bleach. Made in a climate-neutral factory in Vadstena, Sweden. 9 washes (medium water). 500 ml. For contents and further information see www.hm.com/takecare.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with an intarsia-knit motif on the front, long sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Coat in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, concealed buttons down the front, side pockets and a single back vent. Shoulder tabs and decorative gathers at the shoulder seam, a tie belt at the waist and ties at the cuffs. Unlined.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).

prod_name: Beverly HW Loose Mom Fit Dnm
detail_desc: 5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and gently tapered legs.

Top in superstretch jersey with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and a flounce-trimmed V-neck with a narrow tie. Short, flounced sleeves, a seam at the waist with smocking at the back and a gentle flare to the hem.

Shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and side pockets. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Baby Exclusive. Soft shoes in a soft, organic cotton double weave with lacing at the front. Cotton jersey linings and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a motif.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Oversized shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back, and an open chest pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Knee-length, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with pleats at the top and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist with a gathered frill and decorative narrow ties at the sides, and a gathered, softly draping skirt. Lined.
Shorts in woven fabric. High waist with elastication at the back, pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, and side pockets.
Bucket bag in grained imitation leather with two handles and a drawstring at the top and one inner compartment. Size 12x28x30 cm.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide, ribbed top with a supersoft brushed finish. V-neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ties at the hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.

Ballet pumps in glittery imitation leather. Narrow strap over the foot with heart-shaped studs and a hook and loop fastening, and a grosgrain loop at the back. Imitation leather linings, insoles in satin with a print motif, shimmering gold-coloured heels and fluted soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Short, wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Metal watch with a narrow, adjustable imitation leather strap and metal buckle. Width of strap 1.2 cm, total length 22 cm. Diameter of watch 3.8 cm.
Joggers in airy cotton twill with a ribbed, elasticated waistband with a decorative drawstring. Patch front pockets, back pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit with a tie belt and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Scarves in patterned satin that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 30x80 cm.
